Module com.example.sudoku
Package com.example.sudoku.model

Class Game

java.lang.Object
com.example.sudoku.model.GameAdapter
com.example.sudoku.model.Game
All Implemented Interfaces:
IGame
public class Game extends GameAdapter
Class representing a game of 6x6 Sudoku. This class extends the GameAdapter and provides implementations for generating and managing the Sudoku board.
Since:
1.0
Author:
Lady vanessa matabanchoy

    • updateCurrentBoard

      public boolean updateCurrentBoard(int row, int col, int value)
      Updates the Sudoku board at the specified position with a new value.
      Specified by:
      updateCurrentBoard in interface IGame
      Overrides:
      updateCurrentBoard in class GameAdapter
      Parameters:
      row - the row of the board to update.
      col - the column of the board to update.
      value - the new value to place at the specified position.
      Returns:
      true if the update was successful, false otherwise.
